articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from General Confederation of Labor of Vietnam
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from General Confederation of Labor of Vietnam

					Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from the General Confederation of Labor of Vietnam.
					
					The gift was handed to Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Worker's Party of Korea, Wednesday by Dang Ngoc Tung, president of the General Confederation of Labor of Vietnam, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Lao President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Lao President

					Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from Choummaly Saynasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of Laos, on the 63rd anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					Chaleune Warinthrasak, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, conveyed it to an official concerned Wednesday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Palestinian President

					Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from Mahmoud Abbas, president of Palestine, chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization and chief of the Palestinian National Authority, on the 63rd anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					
					It was conveyed to an official concerned by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestine ambassador to the DPRK, on Wednesday.

articles.title: Large Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Cambodian Great King and His Wife
articles.content:
Large Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Cambodian Great King and His Wife

					Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a large floral basket from Norodom Sihanouk, great king of Cambodia, and his wife on the 63rd anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					It was conveyed to the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Monday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Brazilian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Brazilian President

					Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Dilma Vana Rousseff, president of the Federative Republic of Brazil, on Wednesday on the 189th anniversary of its independence.
					
					In the message Kim sincerely wished her greater success in her work for the economic development of the country and social justice and the friendly Brazilian people steady progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Myanmar Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Myanmar Ambassador

					Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Tin U, Myanmar ambassador  to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.
					
					After receiving credentials, Kim had a talk with Tin U.
